content.summary: A Computer Science and Engineering graduate from VELLORE INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY with a CGPA of 7.63/10.0. Skilled in Python, Machine Learning, Data Science, GenAI, LLM, HTML, CSS, and MySQL. Demonstrated strong initiative by developing personal projects such as Traffic Sign Recognition using CNN and Keras, Generative AI-Powered Sales Data Insights and Analysis Chatbot, and Altered Fingerprints Similarity Detection.

experience.title: Traffic Sign Recognition
responsibilities: Revamped and optimized Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) using Keras for real-time traffic sign classification, achieving an exceptional 99.17% accuracy rate.

Enhanced grayscale image processing algorithms and fine-tuned models, achieving a consistent validation accuracy above 98% and boosting classification performance, leading to a 25% reduction in error rates.
Developed an intuitive graphical interface for traffic sign recognition, prioritizing usability and achieving 99.17% accuracy.

experience.title: Generative AI-Powered Sales Data Insights and Analysis Chatbot
responsibilities: Engineered a sales data analysis chatbot with ChatGoogleGenerativeAI, processing over 1,000 rows of data to deliver actionable insights.
Crafted a sales insights generative AI tool utilizing 4 types of graphs enhancing decision making
Designed a real-time solution powered by an advanced LLM facilitating immediate decision-making and enhancing data accessibility for the sales department by taking 10 columns from the dataset

experience.title: Altered Fingerprints Similarity Detection
responsibilities: Handled 1,000 fingerprint images from the SOCOFing dataset.
Applied SIFT to identify and compute key points and descriptors for over 10,000 fingerprint images.
Utilized FlannBasedMatcher with an algorithm index of 1 and 10 trees to achieve efficient key point matching.
Attained a match point ratio exceeding 10% for precise fingerprint matching.
Displayed matching results by resizing images to 4x their original size using OpenCV.

projects.title: Traffic Sign Recognition
projects.objectives: Develop a real-time traffic sign recognition system with an intuitive graphical interface.
projects.contributions: Achieved 99.17% accuracy, optimized CNNs using Keras, enhanced image processing algorithms, and developed a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Generative AI-Powered Sales Data Insights and Analysis Chatbot
projects.objectives: Create an intelligent sales data analysis chatbot that delivers actionable insights.
projects.contributions: Processed over 1,000 rows of data, designed a real-time solution with advanced LLM, and crafted 4 types of graphs for decision making.

projects.title: Altered Fingerprints Similarity Detection
projects.objectives: Develop a system for precise fingerprint matching using SIFT and FlannBasedMatcher.
projects.contributions: Handled 1,000 fingerprint images from the SOCOFing dataset, applied SIFT to identify key points, computed descriptors, utilized efficient key point matching algorithms, and achieved a match point ratio exceeding 10%.

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: 7.63/10.0 CGPA from VELLORE INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Developed personal projects such as Traffic Sign Recognition, Generative AI-Powered Sales Data Insights and Analysis Chatbot, and Altered Fingerprints Similarity Detection.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Managed the online registration system for Sahiti Telugu cultural events and coordinated event logistics
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Effectively communicated project objectives, contributions, and results in the resume
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Strong initiative, creativity, and technical proficiency in developing AI-powered solutions.
